ygData.subject: Re: Dinosaur
ygData.msgSnippet: Hey, that s pretty cool! Give a little, get a little, I guess, LOL. Oh, and I agree... horses and dinosaurs should definitely have bags equiped with them, or
ygData.messageBody:
Hey, that's pretty cool! Give a little, get a little, I guess, LOL. Oh, and
I agree... horses and dinosaurs should definitely have bags equiped with
them, or at least there should be the option to buy some that fit on them...
and they should reduce weight 100%, seeing as you are not the one carrying
them, LOL.

-= Mippon - Level 40 Druid Halfling =-
